Purpose: To specify a relationship between another entity and the entity represented by this vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定另一个实体与此vCard表示的实体之间的关系。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI. It can also be reset to a single text value. The text value can be used to specify textual information.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI。也可以将其重置为单个文本值。文本值可用于指定文本信息。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Special notes: The TYPE parameter MAY be used to characterize the related entity. It contains a comma-separated list of values that are registered with IANA as described in Section 10.2. The registry is pre-populated with the values defined in [xfn]. This document also specifies two additional values:
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：类型参数可用于描述相关实体。它包含一个逗号分隔的值列表，这些值在IANA中注册，如第10.2节所述。注册表预先填充了[xfn]中定义的值。本文件还规定了两个附加值：

contents.text: agent: an entity who may sometimes act on behalf of the entity associated with the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 代理：有时可能代表与vCard相关的实体行事的实体。

contents.text: emergency: indicates an emergency contact
contents.zh-CHS: 紧急：表示紧急联系人

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text: RELATED-param = RELATED-param-uri / RELATED-param-text RELATED-value = URI / text ; Parameter and value MUST match.
contents.zh-CHS: 相关参数=相关参数uri/相关参数文本相关值=uri/文本；参数和值必须匹配。

contents.text:
RELATED-param-uri = "VALUE=uri" / mediatype-param
RELATED-param-text = "VALUE=text" / language-param

RELATED-param =/ pid-param / pref-param / altid-param / type-param
               / any-param
type-param-related = related-type-value *("," related-type-value) ; type-param-related MUST NOT be used with a property other than ; RELATED.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型参数相关=相关类型值*（“，”相关类型值）；type param related不能与以下属性一起使用：；相关的

contents.text:
related-type-value = "contact" / "acquaintance" / "friend" / "met"
                   / "co-worker" / "colleague" / "co-resident"
                   / "neighbor" / "child" / "parent"
                   / "sibling" / "spouse" / "kin" / "muse"
                   / "crush" / "date" / "sweetheart" / "me"
                   / "agent" / "emergency"
Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: RELATED;TYPE=friend:urn:uuid:f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6 RELATED;TYPE=contact:http://example.com/directory/jdoe.vcf RELATED;TYPE=co-worker;VALUE=text:Please contact my assistant Jane Doe for any inquiries.
contents.zh-CHS: 相关的类型=朋友：urn:uuid:f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6相关；类型=联系人：http://example.com/directory/jdoe.vcf 相关的类型=同事；VALUE=text：如有任何疑问，请联系我的助手Jane Doe。

contents.text: 6.7. Explanatory Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7. 解释性质

contents.text: These properties are concerned with additional explanations, such as that related to informational notes or revisions specific to the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些属性与其他解释有关，例如与vCard特定的信息注释或修订相关的解释。

contents.text: 6.7.1. CATEGORIES
Purpose: To specify application category information about the vCard, also known as "tags".
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定有关vCard的应用程序类别信息，也称为“标记”。

contents.text: Value type: One or more text values separated by a COMMA character (U+002C).
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：由逗号字符（U+002C）分隔的一个或多个文本值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
CATEGORIES-param = "VALUE=text" / pid-param / pref-param
                 / type-param / altid-param / any-param
CATEGORIES-value = text-list
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: CATEGORIES:TRAVEL AGENT
contents.zh-CHS: 类别：旅行社

contents.text: CATEGORIES:INTERNET,IETF,INDUSTRY,INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
contents.zh-CHS: 类别：互联网、IETF、工业、信息技术

contents.text: 6.7.2. NOTE
Purpose: To specify supplemental information or a comment that is associated with the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定与vCard相关的补充信息或注释。

contents.text: Value type: A single text value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个文本值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Special notes: The property is based on the X.520 Description attribute [CCITT.X520.1988].
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：该属性基于X.520描述属性[CCITT.X520.1988]。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
NOTE-param = "VALUE=text" / language-param / pid-param / pref-param
           / type-param / altid-param / any-param
NOTE-value = text
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: NOTE:This fax number is operational 0800 to 1715 EST\, Mon-Fri.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：此传真号码为美国东部时间周一至周五0800至1715。

contents.text: 6.7.3. PRODID
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7.3. 普罗迪德

contents.text: Purpose: To specify the identifier for the product that created the vCard object.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：为创建vCard对象的产品指定标识符。

contents.text: Type value: A single text value.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型值：单个文本值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *1
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*1

contents.text: Special notes: Implementations SHOULD use a method such as that specified for Formal Public Identifiers in [ISO9070] or for Universal Resource Names in [RFC3406] to ensure that the text value is unique.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：实现应使用[ISO9070]中为正式公共标识符或[RFC3406]中为通用资源名称指定的方法，以确保文本值是唯一的。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
PRODID-param = "VALUE=text" / any-param
PRODID-value = text
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: PRODID:-//ONLINE DIRECTORY//NONSGML Version 1//EN
Purpose: To specify revision information about the current vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定有关当前vCard的修订信息。

contents.text: Value type: A single timestamp value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个时间戳值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *1
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*1

contents.text: Special notes: The value distinguishes the current revision of the information in this vCard for other renditions of the information.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：该值将此vCard中信息的当前版本与其他版本的信息区分开来。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
REV-param = "VALUE=timestamp" / any-param
REV-value = timestamp
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: 6.7.5. SOUND

Purpose: To specify a digital sound content information that annotates some aspect of the vCard. This property is often used to specify the proper pronunciation of the name property value of the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定用于注释vCard某些方面的数字声音内容信息。此属性通常用于指定vCard的name属性值的正确发音。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
SOUND-param = "VALUE=uri" / language-param / pid-param / pref-param
            / type-param / mediatype-param / altid-param
            / any-param
SOUND-value = URI
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: SOUND:CID:JOHNQPUBLIC.part8.19960229T080000.xyzMail@example.com

SOUND:data:audio/basic;base64,MIICajCCAdOgAwIBAgICBEUwDQYJKoZIh
 AQEEBQAwdzELMAkGA1UEBhMCVVMxLDAqBgNVBAoTI05ldHNjYXBlIENvbW11bm
 ljYXRpb25zIENvcnBvcmF0aW9uMRwwGgYDVQQLExNJbmZvcm1hdGlvbiBTeXN0
 <...the remainder of base64-encoded data...>
Purpose: To specify a value that represents a globally unique identifier corresponding to the entity associated with the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定一个值，该值表示与vCard关联的实体相对应的全局唯一标识符。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI value. It MAY also be reset to free-form text.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI值。也可以将其重置为自由格式文本。

contents.text: Cardinality: *1
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*1

contents.text: Special notes: This property is used to uniquely identify the object that the vCard represents. The "uuid" URN namespace defined in [RFC4122] is particularly well suited to this task, but other URI schemes MAY be used. Free-form text MAY also be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：此属性用于唯一标识vCard表示的对象。[RFC4122]中定义的“uuid”URN命名空间特别适合于此任务，但也可以使用其他URI方案。也可以使用自由格式文本。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text: UID-param = UID-uri-param / UID-text-param UID-value = UID-uri-value / UID-text-value ; Value and parameter MUST match.
contents.zh-CHS: UID-param=UID-uri-param/UID-text-param-UID-value=UID-uri-value/UID-text-value；值和参数必须匹配。

contents.text: UID-uri-param = "VALUE=uri" UID-uri-value = URI
contents.zh-CHS: UID uri param=“VALUE=uri”UID uri VALUE=uri

contents.text: UID-text-param = "VALUE=text" UID-text-value = text
contents.zh-CHS: UID text param=“VALUE=text”UID text VALUE=text

contents.text: UID-param =/ any-param
contents.zh-CHS: UID param=/任何参数

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: UID:urn:uuid:f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6
6.7.7. CLIENTPIDMAP
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7.7. CLIENTPIDMAP

contents.text: Purpose: To give a global meaning to a local PID source identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：为本地PID源标识符赋予全局含义。

contents.text: Value type: A semicolon-separated pair of values. The first field is a small integer corresponding to the second field of a PID parameter instance. The second field is a URI. The "uuid" URN namespace defined in [RFC4122] is particularly well suited to this task, but other URI schemes MAY be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：以分号分隔的一对值。第一个字段是一个小整数，对应于PID参数实例的第二个字段。第二个字段是URI。[RFC4122]中定义的“uuid”URN命名空间特别适合于此任务，但也可以使用其他URI方案。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Special notes: PID source identifiers (the source identifier is the second field in a PID parameter instance) are small integers that only have significance within the scope of a single vCard instance. Each distinct source identifier present in a vCard MUST have an associated CLIENTPIDMAP. See Section 7 for more details on the usage of CLIENTPIDMAP.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：PID源标识符（源标识符是PID参数实例中的第二个字段）是小整数，仅在单个vCard实例的范围内有效。vCard中存在的每个不同的源标识符必须具有关联的CLIENTPIDMAP。有关CLIENTPIDMAP用法的更多详细信息，请参见第7节。

contents.text: PID source identifiers MUST be strictly positive. Zero is not allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: PID源标识符必须严格为正。不允许为零。

contents.text: As a special exception, the PID parameter MUST NOT be applied to this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为特殊例外，PID参数不得应用于此属性。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
CLIENTPIDMAP-param = any-param
CLIENTPIDMAP-value = 1*DIGIT ";" URI
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
TEL;PID=3.1,4.2;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-555-555-5555
EMAIL;PID=4.1,5.2:jdoe@example.com
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:3df403f4-5924-4bb7-b077-3c711d9eb34b
CLIENTPIDMAP:2;urn:uuid:d89c9c7a-2e1b-4832-82de-7e992d95faa5

contents.zh-CHS: 6.7.8. 统一资源定位地址

contents.text: Purpose: To specify a uniform resource locator associated with the object to which the vCard refers. Examples for individuals include personal web sites, blogs, and social networking site identifiers.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定与vCard引用的对象关联的统一资源定位器。个人示例包括个人网站、博客和社交网站标识符。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Value type: A single uri value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个uri值。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
URL-param = "VALUE=uri" / pid-param / pref-param / type-param
          / mediatype-param / altid-param / any-param
URL-value = URI
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: URL:http://example.org/restaurant.french/~chezchic.html
6.7.9. VERSION
Purpose: To specify the version of the vCard specification used to format this vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定用于格式化此vCard的vCard规范版本。

contents.text: Value type: A single text value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个文本值。

contents.text: Cardinality: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：1

contents.text: Special notes: This property MUST be present in the vCard object, and it must appear immediately after BEGIN:VCARD. The value MUST be "4.0" if the vCard corresponds to this specification. Note that earlier versions of vCard allowed this property to be placed anywhere in the vCard object, or even to be absent.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别说明：此属性必须出现在vCard对象中，并且必须在BEGIN:vCard之后立即出现。如果vCard符合本规范，则该值必须为“4.0”。请注意，vCard的早期版本允许将此属性放置在vCard对象中的任何位置，甚至不存在。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
VERSION-param = "VALUE=text" / any-param
VERSION-value = "4.0"
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: VERSION:4.0
6.8. Security Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8. 安全属性

contents.text: These properties are concerned with the security of communication pathways or access to the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些属性与通信路径或vCard访问的安全性有关。

contents.text: Purpose: To specify a public key or authentication certificate associated with the object that the vCard represents.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定与vCard表示的对象关联的公钥或身份验证证书。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI. It can also be reset to a text value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI。也可以将其重置为文本值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text: KEY-param = KEY-uri-param / KEY-text-param KEY-value = KEY-uri-value / KEY-text-value ; Value and parameter MUST match.
contents.zh-CHS: 键参数=键uri参数/键文本参数键值=键uri值/键文本值；值和参数必须匹配。

contents.text:
KEY-uri-param = "VALUE=uri" / mediatype-param
KEY-uri-value = URI
KEY-text-param = "VALUE=text" KEY-text-value = text
contents.zh-CHS: 键文本参数=“值=文本”键文本值=文本

contents.text:
KEY-param =/ altid-param / pid-param / pref-param / type-param
           / any-param
Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: KEY:http://www.example.com/keys/jdoe.cer
KEY;MEDIATYPE=application/pgp-keys:ftp://example.com/keys/jdoe

KEY:data:application/pgp-keys;base64,MIICajCCAdOgAwIBAgICBE
 UwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEEBQAwdzELMAkGA1UEBhMCVVMxLDAqBgNVBAoTI05l
 <... remainder of base64-encoded data ...>
6.9. Calendar Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9. 日历属性

contents.text: These properties are further specified in [RFC2739].
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2739]中进一步规定了这些特性。

contents.text: 6.9.1. FBURL
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.1. FBURL

contents.text: Purpose: To specify the URI for the busy time associated with the object that the vCard represents.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定与vCard表示的对象关联的繁忙时间的URI。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Special notes: Where multiple FBURL properties are specified, the default FBURL property is indicated with the PREF parameter. The FTP [RFC1738] or HTTP [RFC2616] type of URI points to an iCalendar [RFC5545] object associated with a snapshot of the next few weeks or months of busy time data. If the iCalendar object is represented as a file or document, its file extension should be ".ifb".
contents.zh-CHS: 特别注意：如果指定了多个FBURL属性，则默认FBURL属性将使用PREF参数指示。FTP[RFC1738]或HTTP[RFC2616]类型的URI指向与接下来几周或几个月繁忙时间数据的快照相关联的iCalendar[RFC5545]对象。如果iCalendar对象表示为文件或文档，则其文件扩展名应为“.ifb”。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
FBURL-param = "VALUE=uri" / pid-param / pref-param / type-param
            / mediatype-param / altid-param / any-param
FBURL-value = URI
Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text:
FBURL;PREF=1:http://www.example.com/busy/janedoe
FBURL;MEDIATYPE=text/calendar:ftp://example.com/busy/project-a.ifb
6.9.2. CALADRURI
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2. 卡拉杜里

contents.text: Purpose: To specify the calendar user address [RFC5545] to which a scheduling request [RFC5546] should be sent for the object represented by the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定日历用户地址[RFC5545]，vCard表示的对象的调度请求[RFC5546]应发送到该地址。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Special notes: Where multiple CALADRURI properties are specified, the default CALADRURI property is indicated with the PREF parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别注意：如果指定了多个CALADRURI属性，则默认的CALADRURI属性用PREF参数表示。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
CALADRURI-param = "VALUE=uri" / pid-param / pref-param / type-param
                / mediatype-param / altid-param / any-param
CALADRURI-value = URI
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
CALADRURI;PREF=1:mailto:janedoe@example.com
CALADRURI:http://example.com/calendar/jdoe
6.9.3. CALURI
Purpose: To specify the URI for a calendar associated with the object represented by the vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：为与vCard表示的对象关联的日历指定URI。

contents.text: Value type: A single URI value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：单个URI值。

contents.text: Cardinality: *
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：*

contents.text: Special notes: Where multiple CALURI properties are specified, the default CALURI property is indicated with the PREF parameter. The property should contain a URI pointing to an iCalendar [RFC5545]
contents.zh-CHS: 特别注意：如果指定了多个CALURI属性，则默认的CALURI属性用PREF参数表示。属性应包含指向iCalendar[RFC5545]的URI

contents.text: object associated with a snapshot of the user's calendar store. If the iCalendar object is represented as a file or document, its file extension should be ".ics".
contents.zh-CHS: 与用户日历存储的快照关联的对象。如果iCalendar对象表示为文件或文档，则其文件扩展名应为“.ics”。

contents.text: ABNF:
contents.zh-CHS: 荷兰银行：

contents.text:
CALURI-param = "VALUE=uri" / pid-param / pref-param / type-param
             / mediatype-param / altid-param / any-param
CALURI-value = URI
Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text:
CALURI;PREF=1:http://cal.example.com/calA
CALURI;MEDIATYPE=text/calendar:ftp://ftp.example.com/calA.ics
6.10. Extended Properties and Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 6.10. 扩展属性和参数

contents.text: The properties and parameters defined by this document can be extended. Non-standard, private properties and parameters with a name starting with "X-" may be defined bilaterally between two cooperating agents without outside registration or standardization.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以扩展此文档定义的属性和参数。名称以“X-”开头的非标准私有属性和参数可在两个合作代理之间进行双边定义，无需外部注册或标准化。

contents.text: 7. Synchronization
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 同步

contents.text: vCard data often needs to be synchronized between devices. In this context, synchronization is defined as the intelligent merging of two representations of the same object. vCard 4.0 includes mechanisms to aid this process.
contents.zh-CHS: vCard数据通常需要在设备之间同步。在此上下文中，同步被定义为同一对象的两个表示的智能合并。vCard 4.0包括帮助此过程的机制。

contents.text: 7.1. Mechanisms
Two mechanisms are available: the UID property is used to match multiple instances of the same vCard, while the PID parameter is used to match multiple instances of the same property.
contents.zh-CHS: 有两种机制可用：UID属性用于匹配同一vCard的多个实例，而PID参数用于匹配同一属性的多个实例。

contents.text: The term "matching" is used here to mean recognizing that two instances are in fact representations of the same object. For example, a single vCard that is shared with someone results in two vCard instances. After they have evolved separately, they still represent the same object, and therefore may be matched by a synchronization engine.
contents.zh-CHS: 术语“匹配”在这里用于表示认识到两个实例实际上是同一对象的表示。例如，与某人共享的单个vCard会导致两个vCard实例。在它们分别进化之后，它们仍然表示相同的对象，因此可以通过同步引擎进行匹配。

contents.text: 7.1.1. Matching vCard Instances
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.1. 匹配vCard实例

contents.text: vCard instances for which the UID properties (Section 6.7.6) are equivalent MUST be matched. Equivalence is determined as specified in [RFC3986], Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须匹配UID属性（第6.7.6节）等效的vCard实例。根据[RFC3986]第6节的规定确定等效性。

contents.text: In all other cases, vCard instances MAY be matched at the discretion of the synchronization engine.
contents.zh-CHS: 在所有其他情况下，同步引擎可自行决定是否匹配vCard实例。

contents.text: 7.1.2. Matching Property Instances
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.2. 匹配属性实例

contents.text: Property instances belonging to unmatched vCards MUST NOT be matched.
contents.zh-CHS: 属于不匹配vCard的属性实例不能匹配。

contents.text: Property instances whose name (e.g., EMAIL, TEL, etc.) is not the same MUST NOT be matched.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称（如电子邮件、电话等）不同的属性实例不得匹配。

contents.text: Property instances whose name is CLIENTPIDMAP are handled separately and MUST NOT be matched. The synchronization MUST ensure that there is consistency of CLIENTPIDMAPs among matched vCard instances.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称为CLIENTPIDMAP的属性实例是单独处理的，不能匹配。同步必须确保在匹配的vCard实例之间存在CLIENTPIDMAPs的一致性。

contents.text: Property instances belonging to matched vCards, whose name is the same, and whose maximum cardinality is 1, MUST be matched.
contents.zh-CHS: 属于匹配vCard的属性实例（名称相同，最大基数为1）必须匹配。

contents.text: Property instances belonging to matched vCards, whose name is the same, and whose PID parameters match, MUST be matched. See Section 7.1.3 for details on PID matching.
contents.zh-CHS: 属于匹配vCard的属性实例（其名称相同且PID参数匹配）必须匹配。有关PID匹配的详细信息，请参见第7.1.3节。

contents.text: In all other cases, property instances MAY be matched at the discretion of the synchronization engine.
contents.zh-CHS: 在所有其他情况下，同步引擎可以自行决定是否匹配属性实例。

contents.text: 7.1.3. PID Matching
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.3. PID匹配

contents.text: Two PID values for which the first fields are equivalent represent the same local value.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个字段等效的两个PID值表示相同的局部值。

contents.text: Two PID values representing the same local value and for which the second fields point to CLIENTPIDMAP properties whose second field URIs are equivalent (as specified in [RFC3986], Section 6) also represent the same global value.
contents.zh-CHS: 两个PID值表示相同的局部值，第二个字段指向第二个字段URI等效的CLIENTPIDMAP属性（如[RFC3986]第6节所述），也表示相同的全局值。

contents.text: PID parameters for which at least one pair of their values represent the same global value MUST be matched.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须匹配至少一对值表示相同全局值的PID参数。

contents.text: In all other cases, PID parameters MAY be matched at the discretion of the synchronization engine.
contents.zh-CHS: 在所有其他情况下，同步引擎可自行决定匹配PID参数。

contents.text: For example, PID value "5.1", in the first vCard below, and PID value "5.2", in the second vCard below, represent the same global value.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，下面第一个vCard中的PID值“5.1”和下面第二个vCard中的PID值“5.2”表示相同的全局值。

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
EMAIL;PID=4.2,5.1:jdoe@example.com
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:3eef374e-7179-4196-a914-27358c3e6527
CLIENTPIDMAP:2;urn:uuid:42bcd5a7-1699-4514-87b4-056edf68e9cc
END:VCARD

BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
EMAIL;PID=5.1,5.2:john@example.com
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:0c75c629-6a8d-4d5e-a07f-1bb35846854d
CLIENTPIDMAP:2;urn:uuid:3eef374e-7179-4196-a914-27358c3e6527
END:VCARD
7.2. Example
7.2.1. Creation
The following simple vCard is first created on a given device.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下简单vCard首先在给定设备上创建。

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
UID:urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1
FN;PID=1.1:J. Doe
N:Doe;J.;;;
EMAIL;PID=1.1:jdoe@example.com
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556
END:VCARD

This new vCard is assigned the UID "urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1" by the creating device. The FN and EMAIL properties are assigned the same local value of 1, and this value is given global context by associating it with "urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556", which represents the creating device. We are at liberty to reuse the same local value since instances of different properties will never be matched. The N property has no PID because it is forbidden by its maximum cardinality of 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 创建设备为该新vCard分配了UID“urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1”。FN和电子邮件属性被赋予相同的本地值1，该值通过将其与表示创建设备的“urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556”相关联而被赋予全局上下文。我们可以自由地重用相同的局部值，因为不同属性的实例永远不会匹配。N属性没有PID，因为它的最大基数为1。

contents.text: 7.2.2. Initial Sharing
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.2. 初始共享

contents.text: This vCard is shared with a second device. Upon inspecting the UID property, the second device understands that this is a new vCard (i.e., unmatched) and thus the synchronization results in a simple copy.
contents.zh-CHS: 此vCard与第二台设备共享。在检查UID属性后，第二个设备知道这是一个新的vCard（即，不匹配），因此同步会产生一个简单的副本。

contents.text: 7.2.3. Adding and Sharing a Property
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.3. 添加和共享属性

contents.text: A new phone number is created on the first device, then the vCard is shared with the second device. This is what the second device receives:
contents.zh-CHS: 在第一台设备上创建新的电话号码，然后与第二台设备共享vCard。这是第二台设备接收的内容：

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
UID:urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1
FN;PID=1.1:J. Doe
N:Doe;J.;;;
EMAIL;PID=1.1:jdoe@example.com
TEL;PID=1.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-555-555-5555
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556
END:VCARD

Upon inspecting the UID property, the second device matches the vCard it received to the vCard that it already has stored. It then starts comparing the properties of the two vCards in same-named pairs.
contents.zh-CHS: 检查UID属性后，第二个设备将其接收的vCard与已存储的vCard进行匹配。然后开始比较同一命名对中两个vCard的属性。

contents.text: The FN properties are matched because the PID parameters have the same global value. Since the property value is the same, no update takes place.
contents.zh-CHS: FN属性是匹配的，因为PID参数具有相同的全局值。由于属性值相同，因此不会进行更新。

contents.text: The N properties are matched automatically because their maximum cardinality is 1. Since the property value is the same, no update takes place.
contents.zh-CHS: N个属性自动匹配，因为它们的最大基数为1。由于属性值相同，因此不会进行更新。

contents.text: The EMAIL properties are matched because the PID parameters have the same global value. Since the property value is the same, no update takes place.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子邮件属性是匹配的，因为PID参数具有相同的全局值。由于属性值相同，因此不会进行更新。

contents.text: The TEL property in the new vCard is not matched to any in the stored vCard because no property in the stored vCard has the same name. Therefore, this property is copied from the new vCard to the stored vCard.
contents.zh-CHS: 新vCard中的TEL属性与存储vCard中的任何属性都不匹配，因为存储vCard中没有具有相同名称的属性。因此，此属性将从新vCard复制到存储的vCard。

contents.text: The CLIENTPIDMAP property is handled separately by the synchronization engine. It ensures that it is consistent with the stored one. If it was not, the results would be up to the synchronization engine, and thus undefined by this document.
contents.zh-CHS: CLIENTPIDMAP属性由同步引擎单独处理。它确保它与存储的一致。如果不是，结果将由同步引擎决定，因此本文档未定义。

contents.text: 7.2.4. Simultaneous Editing
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4. 同步编辑

contents.text: A new email address and a new phone number are added to the vCard on each of the two devices, and then a new synchronization event happens. Here are the vCards that are communicated to each other:
contents.zh-CHS: 两台设备上的vCard都会添加新的电子邮件地址和电话号码，然后会发生新的同步事件。以下是相互通信的vCard：

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
UID:urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1
FN;PID=1.1:J. Doe
N:Doe;J.;;;
EMAIL;PID=1.1:jdoe@example.com
EMAIL;PID=2.1:boss@example.com
TEL;PID=1.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-555-555-5555
TEL;PID=2.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-666-666-6666
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556
END:VCARD

BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
UID:urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1
FN;PID=1.1:J. Doe
N:Doe;J.;;;
EMAIL;PID=1.1:jdoe@example.com
EMAIL;PID=2.2:ceo@example.com
TEL;PID=1.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-555-555-5555
TEL;PID=2.2;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-666-666-6666
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556
CLIENTPIDMAP:2;urn:uuid:1f762d2b-03c4-4a83-9a03-75ff658a6eee
END:VCARD

On the first device, the same PID source identifier (1) is reused for the new EMAIL and TEL properties. On the second device, a new source identifier (2) is generated, and a corresponding CLIENTPIDMAP property is created. It contains the second device's identifier, "urn:uuid:1f762d2b-03c4-4a83-9a03-75ff658a6eee".
contents.zh-CHS: 在第一个设备上，相同的PID源标识符（1）被重新用于新的电子邮件和电话属性。在第二个设备上，生成新的源标识符（2），并创建相应的CLIENTPIDMAP属性。它包含第二个设备的标识符“urn:uuid:1f762d2b-03c4-4a83-9a03-75ff658a6eee”。

contents.text: The new EMAIL properties are unmatched on both sides since the PID global value is new in both cases. The sync thus results in a copy on both sides.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于PID全局值在这两种情况下都是新的，因此新的电子邮件属性在两侧都是不匹配的。因此，同步会在两侧产生一个副本。

contents.text: Although the situation appears to be the same for the TEL properties, in this case, the synchronization engine is particularly smart and matches the two new TEL properties even though their PID global values are different. Note that in this case, the rules of Section 7.1.2 state that two properties MAY be matched at the discretion of the synchronization engine. Therefore, the two properties are merged.
contents.zh-CHS: 尽管TEL属性的情况似乎相同，但在本例中，同步引擎特别智能，并匹配两个新的TEL属性，即使它们的PID全局值不同。请注意，在这种情况下，第7.1.2节的规则规定，同步引擎可自行决定匹配两个属性。因此，这两个属性合并。

contents.text: All this results in the following vCard, which is stored on both devices:
contents.zh-CHS: 所有这些都会产生以下vCard，该vCard存储在两个设备上：

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
UID:urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1
FN:J. Doe
N:Doe;J.;;;
EMAIL;PID=1.1:jdoe@example.com
EMAIL;PID=2.1:boss@example.com
EMAIL;PID=2.2:ceo@example.com
TEL;PID=1.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-555-555-5555
TEL;PID=2.1,2.2;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-666-666-6666
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556
CLIENTPIDMAP:2;urn:uuid:1f762d2b-03c4-4a83-9a03-75ff658a6eee
END:VCARD
7.2.5. Global Context Simplification
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.5. 全局上下文简化

contents.text: The two devices finish their synchronization procedure by simplifying their global contexts. Since they haven't talked to any other device, the following vCard is for all purposes equivalent to the above. It is also shorter.
contents.zh-CHS: 这两个设备通过简化全局上下文来完成同步过程。由于他们没有与任何其他设备通话，因此以下vCard在所有方面都与上述vCard等效。它也比较短。

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
UID:urn:uuid:4fbe8971-0bc3-424c-9c26-36c3e1eff6b1
FN:J. Doe
N:Doe;J.;;;
EMAIL;PID=1.1:jdoe@example.com
EMAIL;PID=2.1:boss@example.com
EMAIL;PID=3.1:ceo@example.com
TEL;PID=1.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-555-555-5555
TEL;PID=2.1;VALUE=uri:tel:+1-666-666-6666
CLIENTPIDMAP:1;urn:uuid:53e374d9-337e-4727-8803-a1e9c14e0556
END:VCARD

The details of global context simplification are unspecified by this document. They are left up to the synchronization engine. This example is merely intended to illustrate the possibility, which investigating would be, in the author's opinion, worthwhile.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件未详细说明全局上下文简化的细节。它们留给同步引擎处理。这个例子仅仅是为了说明这种可能性，在作者看来，调查这种可能性是值得的。

contents.text: 8. Example: Author's vCard
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 示例：作者的vCard

contents.text:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:4.0
FN:Simon Perreault
N:Perreault;Simon;;;ing. jr,M.Sc.
BDAY:--0203
ANNIVERSARY:20090808T1430-0500
GENDER:M

LANG;PREF=1:fr
LANG;PREF=2:en
ORG;TYPE=work:Viagenie
ADR;TYPE=work:;Suite D2-630;2875 Laurier;
 Quebec;QC;G1V 2M2;Canada
TEL;VALUE=uri;TYPE="work,voice";PREF=1:tel:+1-418-656-9254;ext=102
TEL;VALUE=uri;TYPE="work,cell,voice,video,text":tel:+1-418-262-6501
EMAIL;TYPE=work:simon.perreault@viagenie.ca
GEO;TYPE=work:geo:46.772673,-71.282945
KEY;TYPE=work;VALUE=uri:
 http://www.viagenie.ca/simon.perreault/simon.asc
TZ:-0500
URL;TYPE=home:http://nomis80.org
END:VCARD
9. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 安全考虑

contents.text: o Internet mail is often used to transport vCards and is subject to many well-known security attacks, including monitoring, replay, and forgery. Care should be taken by any directory service in allowing information to leave the scope of the service itself, where any access controls or confidentiality can no longer be guaranteed. Applications should also take care to display directory data in a "safe" environment.
contents.zh-CHS: o Internet邮件通常用于传输vCard，并受到许多众所周知的安全攻击，包括监视、重播和伪造。任何目录服务在允许信息离开服务范围时都应小心，因为在这种情况下，任何访问控制或机密性都不再能够得到保证。应用程序还应注意在“安全”环境中显示目录数据。

contents.text: o vCards can carry cryptographic keys or certificates, as described in Section 6.8.1.
contents.zh-CHS: o vCard可以携带加密密钥或证书，如第6.8.1节所述。

contents.text: o vCards often carry information that can be sensitive (e.g., birthday, address, and phone information). Although vCards have no inherent authentication or confidentiality provisions, they can easily be carried by any security mechanism that transfers MIME objects to address authentication or confidentiality (e.g., S/MIME [RFC5751], OpenPGP [RFC4880]). In cases where the confidentiality or authenticity of information contained in vCard is a concern, the vCard SHOULD be transported using one of these secure mechanisms. The KEY property (Section 6.8.1) can be used to transport the public key used by these mechanisms.
contents.zh-CHS: o vCard通常携带敏感信息（例如生日、地址和电话信息）。尽管vCard没有固有的身份验证或机密性规定，但任何传输MIME对象以解决身份验证或机密性的安全机制（例如S/MIME[RFC5751]，OpenPGP[RFC4880]）都可以轻松携带vCard。如果担心vCard中包含的信息的机密性或真实性，则应使用这些安全机制之一传输vCard。密钥属性（第6.8.1节）可用于传输这些机制使用的公钥。

contents.text: o The information in a vCard may become out of date. In cases where the vitality of data is important to an originator of a vCard, the SOURCE property (Section 6.1.3) SHOULD be specified. In addition, the "REV" type described in Section 6.7.4 can be specified to indicate the last time that the vCard data was updated.
contents.zh-CHS: o vCard中的信息可能会过时。如果数据的生命力对vCard的发起人很重要，则应指定源属性（第6.1.3节）。此外，可以指定第6.7.4节中描述的“版本”类型，以指示vCard数据上次更新的时间。

contents.text: o Many vCard properties may be used to transport URIs. Please refer to [RFC3986], Section 7, for considerations related to URIs.
contents.zh-CHS: o 许多vCard属性可用于传输URI。有关URI的注意事项，请参考[RFC3986]第7节。

contents.text: 10. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 10. IANA考虑

contents.text: 10.1. Media Type Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. 媒体类型注册

contents.text: IANA has registered the following Media Type (in <http://www.iana.org/>) and marked the text/directory Media Type as DEPRECATED.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已注册以下媒体类型（在<http://www.iana.org/>)并将文本/目录媒体类型标记为已弃用。

contents.text: To: ietf-types@iana.org
contents.zh-CHS: 致：ietf-types@iana.org

contents.text: Subject: Registration of media type text/vcard
contents.zh-CHS: 主题：媒体类型文本/vcard的注册

contents.text: Type name: text
contents.zh-CHS: 类型名称：text

contents.text: Subtype name: vcard
contents.zh-CHS: 子类型名称：vcard

contents.text: Required parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 所需参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: version
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：版本

contents.text: The "version" parameter is to be interpreted identically as the VERSION vCard property. If this parameter is present, all vCards in a text/vcard body part MUST have a VERSION property with value identical to that of this MIME parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: “版本”参数的解释与版本vCard属性相同。如果存在此参数，则文本/vcard正文部分中的所有vcard必须具有与此MIME参数值相同的VERSION属性。

contents.text: "charset": as defined for text/plain [RFC2046]; encodings other than UTF-8 [RFC3629] MUST NOT be used.
contents.zh-CHS: “字符集”：定义为文本/普通[RFC2046]；不得使用UTF-8[RFC3629]以外的编码。

contents.text: Encoding considerations: 8bit
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：8位

contents.text: Security considerations: See Section 9.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全注意事项：见第9节。

contents.text: Interoperability considerations: The text/vcard media type is intended to identify vCard data of any version. There are older specifications of vCard [RFC2426][vCard21] still in common use. While these formats are similar, they are not strictly compatible. In general, it is necessary to inspect the value of the VERSION property (see Section 6.7.9) for identifying the standard to which a given vCard object conforms.
contents.zh-CHS: 互操作性注意事项：文本/vcard介质类型旨在标识任何版本的vcard数据。vCard[RFC2426][vCard21]的旧规格仍在普遍使用。虽然这些格式相似，但并不完全兼容。通常，有必要检查版本属性的值（见第6.7.9节），以确定给定vCard对象符合的标准。

contents.text: In addition, the following media types are known to have been used to refer to vCard data. They should be considered deprecated in favor of text/vcard.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，已知以下介质类型已用于引用vCard数据。应将其视为不推荐使用的文本/vcard。

contents.text: * text/directory * text/directory; profile=vcard * text/x-vcard
contents.zh-CHS: * text/目录*text/目录；配置文件=vcard*文本/x-vcard

contents.text: Published specification: RFC 6350
contents.zh-CHS: 已发布规范：RFC 6350

contents.text: Applications that use this media type: They are numerous, diverse, and include mail user agents, instant messaging clients, address book applications, directory servers, and customer relationship management software.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用此媒体类型的应用程序：它们数量众多、种类繁多，包括邮件用户代理、即时消息客户端、通讯簿应用程序、目录服务器和客户关系管理软件。

contents.text: Additional information:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他信息：

contents.text: Magic number(s):
contents.zh-CHS: 幻数：

contents.text: File extension(s): .vcf .vcard
contents.zh-CHS: 文件扩展名：.vcf.vcard

contents.text: Macintosh file type code(s):
contents.zh-CHS: Macintosh文件类型代码：

contents.text:
Person & email address to contact for further information:  vCard
   discussion mailing list <vcarddav@ietf.org>
Intended usage: COMMON
contents.zh-CHS: 预期用途：普通

contents.text: Restrictions on usage: none
contents.zh-CHS: 使用限制：无

contents.text: Author: Simon Perreault
contents.zh-CHS: 作者：西蒙·佩雷尔特

contents.text: Change controller: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: 更改控制器：IETF

contents.text: 10.2. Registering New vCard Elements
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. 注册新vCard元素

contents.text: This section defines the process for registering new or modified vCard elements (i.e., properties, parameters, value data types, and values) with IANA.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了向IANA注册新的或修改的vCard元素（即属性、参数、值数据类型和值）的过程。

contents.text: 10.2.1. Registration Procedure

The IETF has created a mailing list, vcarddav@ietf.org, which can be used for public discussion of vCard element proposals prior to registration. Use of the mailing list is strongly encouraged. The IESG has appointed a designated expert who will monitor the vcarddav@ietf.org mailing list and review registrations.
contents.zh-CHS: IETF已经创建了一个邮件列表，vcarddav@ietf.org，可用于注册前vCard元素提案的公开讨论。强烈鼓励使用邮件列表。IESG已经任命了一名指定专家，负责监督vcarddav@ietf.org邮件列表和审查注册。

contents.text: Registration of new vCard elements MUST be reviewed by the designated expert and published in an RFC. A Standards Track RFC is REQUIRED for the registration of new value data types that modify existing properties. A Standards Track RFC is also REQUIRED for registration of vCard elements that modify vCard elements previously documented in a Standards Track RFC.
contents.zh-CHS: 新vCard元件的注册必须由指定专家审查，并在RFC中公布。注册修改现有属性的新值数据类型需要标准跟踪RFC。注册vCard元素时还需要标准跟踪RFC，该vCard元素可修改先前记录在标准跟踪RFC中的vCard元素。

contents.text: The registration procedure begins when a completed registration template, defined in the sections below, is sent to vcarddav@ietf.org and iana@iana.org. Within two weeks, the designated expert is expected to tell IANA and the submitter of the registration whether the registration is approved, approved with minor changes, or rejected with cause. When a registration is rejected with cause, it can be re-submitted if the concerns listed in the cause are addressed. Decisions made by the designated expert can be appealed to the IESG Applications Area Director, then to the IESG. They follow the normal appeals procedure for IESG decisions.
contents.zh-CHS: 当以下各节中定义的已完成注册模板发送到时，注册过程开始vcarddav@ietf.org和iana@iana.org. 在两周内，指定专家将告知IANA和注册提交人注册是否被批准、批准时有微小变更还是有理由拒绝。当有理由拒绝注册时，如果原因中列出的问题得到解决，则可以重新提交注册。指定专家做出的决定可向IESG应用领域总监提出上诉，然后再向IESG提出上诉。他们遵循IESG裁决的正常上诉程序。

contents.text: Once the registration procedure concludes successfully, IANA creates or modifies the corresponding record in the vCard registry. The completed registration template is discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 注册过程成功结束后，IANA将在vCard注册表中创建或修改相应的记录。已完成的注册模板将被丢弃。

contents.text: An RFC specifying new vCard elements MUST include the completed registration templates, which MAY be expanded with additional information. These completed templates are intended to go in the body of the document, not in the IANA Considerations section.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定新vCard元素的RFC必须包括已完成的注册模板，该模板可以用其他信息展开。这些已完成的模板将放在文档正文中，而不是IANA注意事项部分。

contents.text: Finally, note that there is an XML representation for vCard defined in [RFC6351]. An XML representation SHOULD be defined for new vCard elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后，请注意，[RFC6351]中定义了vCard的XML表示形式。应为新vCard元素定义XML表示。

contents.text: 10.2.2. Vendor Namespace
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2. 供应商名称空间

contents.text: The vendor namespace is used for vCard elements associated with commercially available products. "Vendor" or "producer" are construed as equivalent and very broadly in this context.
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商名称空间用于与商用产品关联的vCard元素。“供应商”或“生产商”在本上下文中被解释为等效且非常广泛。

contents.text: A registration may be placed in the vendor namespace by anyone who needs to interchange files associated with the particular product. However, the registration formally belongs to the vendor or organization handling the vCard elements in the namespace being registered. Changes to the specification will be made at their request, as discussed in subsequent sections.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何需要交换与特定产品关联的文件的人都可以将注册放在供应商名称空间中。但是，注册正式属于处理注册名称空间中vCard元素的供应商或组织。如后续章节所述，将根据其要求对规范进行更改。

contents.text: vCard elements belonging to the vendor namespace will be distinguished by the "VND-" prefix. This is followed by an IANA-registered Private Enterprise Number (PEN), a dash, and a vCard element designation of the vendor's choosing (e.g., "VND-123456- MUDPIE").
contents.zh-CHS: 属于供应商名称空间的vCard元素将通过“VND-”前缀进行区分。然后是IANA注册的私营企业编号（PEN）、破折号和供应商选择的vCard元素名称（例如，“VND-123456-MUDPIE”）。

contents.text: While public exposure and review of vCard elements to be registered in the vendor namespace are not required, using the vcarddav@ietf.org mailing list for review is strongly encouraged to improve the quality of those specifications. Registrations in the vendor namespace may be submitted directly to the IANA.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然不需要公开和审查要在供应商名称空间中注册的vCard元素，但使用vcarddav@ietf.org强烈鼓励审查邮件列表，以提高这些规范的质量。供应商名称空间中的注册可以直接提交给IANA。

contents.text: 10.2.3. Registration Template for Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.3. 物业注册模板

contents.text: A property is defined by completing the following template.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性是通过完成以下模板定义的。

contents.text: Namespace: Empty for the global namespace, "VND-NNNN-" for a vendor-specific property (where NNNN is replaced by the vendor's PEN).
contents.zh-CHS: 命名空间：对于供应商特定属性的全局命名空间“VND-NNNN-”为空（其中NNNN由供应商的笔替换）。

contents.text: Property name: The name of the property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：属性的名称。

contents.text: Purpose: The purpose of the property. Give a short but clear description.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：财产的目的。给出一个简短但清晰的描述。

contents.text: Value type: Any of the valid value types for the property value needs to be specified. The default value type also needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：需要指定属性值的任何有效值类型。还需要指定默认值类型。

contents.text: Cardinality: See Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: 基数：见第6节。

contents.text: Property parameters: Any of the valid property parameters for the property MUST be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：必须指定属性的任何有效属性参数。

contents.text: Description: Any special notes about the property, how it is to be used, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：关于该物业的任何特别说明，如何使用等。

contents.text: Format definition: The ABNF for the property definition needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：需要指定属性定义的ABNF。

contents.text: Example(s): One or more examples of instances of the property need to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：需要指定属性实例的一个或多个示例。

contents.text: 10.2.4. Registration Template for Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.4. 参数的注册模板

contents.text: A parameter is defined by completing the following template.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过完成以下模板定义参数。

contents.text: Namespace: Empty for the global namespace, "VND-NNNN-" for a vendor-specific property (where NNNN is replaced by the vendor's PEN).
contents.zh-CHS: 命名空间：对于供应商特定属性的全局命名空间“VND-NNNN-”为空（其中NNNN由供应商的笔替换）。

contents.text: Parameter name: The name of the parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数名称：参数的名称。

contents.text: Purpose: The purpose of the parameter. Give a short but clear description.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：参数的用途。给出一个简短但清晰的描述。

contents.text: Description: Any special notes about the parameter, how it is to be used, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：有关参数、如何使用参数等的任何特殊说明。

contents.text: Format definition: The ABNF for the parameter definition needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：需要指定参数定义的ABNF。

contents.text: Example(s): One or more examples of instances of the parameter need to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：需要指定参数实例的一个或多个示例。

contents.text: 10.2.5. Registration Template for Value Data Types
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.5. 值数据类型的注册模板

contents.text: A value data type is defined by completing the following template.
contents.zh-CHS: 值数据类型是通过完成以下模板定义的。

contents.text: Value name: The name of the value type.
contents.zh-CHS: 值名称：值类型的名称。

contents.text: Purpose: The purpose of the value type. Give a short but clear description.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：值类型的目的。给出一个简短但清晰的描述。

contents.text: Description: Any special notes about the value type, how it is to be used, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：有关值类型、如何使用等的任何特殊说明。

contents.text: Format definition: The ABNF for the value type definition needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：需要指定值类型定义的ABNF。

contents.text: Example(s): One or more examples of instances of the value type need to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：需要指定值类型实例的一个或多个示例。

contents.text: 10.2.6. Registration Template for Values
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.6. 值的注册模板

contents.text: A value is defined by completing the following template.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过完成以下模板定义值。

contents.text: Value: The value literal.
contents.zh-CHS: Value：值文本。

contents.text: Purpose: The purpose of the value. Give a short but clear description.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：价值的目的。给出一个简短但清晰的描述。

contents.text: Conformance: The vCard properties and/or parameters that can take this value needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：需要指定可接受此值的vCard属性和/或参数。

contents.text: Example(s): One or more examples of instances of the value need to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：需要指定值实例的一个或多个示例。

contents.text: The following is a fictitious example of a registration of a vCard value:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是虚拟的vCard值注册示例：

contents.text: Value: supervisor
contents.zh-CHS: 价值观：主管

contents.text: Purpose: It means that the related entity is the direct hierarchical superior (i.e., supervisor or manager) of the entity this vCard represents.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：这意味着相关实体是该vCard所代表实体的直接层级上级（即主管或经理）。

contents.text: Conformance: This value can be used with the "TYPE" parameter applied on the "RELATED" property.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：该值可与应用于“相关”属性的“类型”参数一起使用。

contents.text: Example(s):
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: RELATED;TYPE=supervisor:urn:uuid:f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6

contents.text: Appendix A. Differences from RFCs 2425 and 2426
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.与RFC 2425和2426的差异

contents.text: This appendix contains a high-level overview of the major changes that have been made in the vCard specification from RFCs 2425 and 2426. It is incomplete, as it only lists the most important changes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本附录概述了RFCs 2425和2426在vCard规范中所做的主要更改。它是不完整的，因为它只列出了最重要的更改。

contents.text: A.1. New Structure
contents.zh-CHS: A.1. 新结构

contents.text: o [RFC2425] and [RFC2426] have been merged.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2425]和[RFC2426]已合并。

contents.text: o vCard is now not only a MIME type but a stand-alone format.
contents.zh-CHS: o vCard现在不仅是一种MIME类型，而且是一种独立的格式。

contents.text: o A proper MIME type registration form has been included.
contents.zh-CHS: o 已包括一份适当的MIME类型登记表。

contents.text: o UTF-8 is now the only possible character set.
contents.zh-CHS: o UTF-8现在是唯一可能的字符集。

contents.text: o New vCard elements can be registered from IANA.
contents.zh-CHS: o 可以从IANA注册新的vCard元素。

contents.text: A.2. Removed Features
contents.zh-CHS: A.2. 删除的功能

contents.text: o The CONTEXT and CHARSET parameters are no more.
contents.zh-CHS: o 上下文和字符集参数不再存在。

contents.text: o The NAME, MAILER, LABEL, and CLASS properties are no more.
contents.zh-CHS: o 名称、邮件程序、标签和类属性不再存在。

contents.text: o The "intl", "dom", "postal", and "parcel" TYPE parameter values for the ADR property have been removed.
contents.zh-CHS: o ADR属性的“intl”、“dom”、“postal”和“parcel”类型参数值已删除。

contents.text: o In-line vCards (such as the value of the AGENT property) are no longer supported.
contents.zh-CHS: o 不再支持内嵌vCard（例如代理属性的值）。

contents.text: A.3. New Properties and Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: A.3. 新特性和参数

contents.text: o The KIND, GENDER, LANG, ANNIVERSARY, XML, and CLIENTPIDMAP properties have been added.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加了种类、性别、语言、周年纪念、XML和CLIENTPIDMAP属性。

contents.text: o [RFC2739], which defines the FBURL, CALADRURI, CAPURI, and CALURI properties, has been merged in.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2739]定义了FBURL、CALADRURI、CAPURI和CALURI属性，已合并到中。

contents.text: o [RFC4770], which defines the IMPP property, has been merged in.
contents.zh-CHS: o 定义IMPP属性的[RFC4770]已合并到中。

contents.text: o The "work" and "home" TYPE parameter values are now applicable to many more properties.
contents.zh-CHS: o “work”和“home”类型参数值现在适用于更多的特性。

contents.text: o The "pref" value of the TYPE parameter is now a parameter of its own, with a positive integer value indicating the level of preference.
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型参数的“pref”值现在是它自己的参数，带有一个正整数值表示首选级别。

contents.text: o The ALTID and PID parameters have been added.
contents.zh-CHS: o 增加了ALTID和PID参数。

contents.text: o The MEDIATYPE parameter has been added and replaces the TYPE parameter when it was used for indicating the media type of the property's content.
contents.zh-CHS: o 已添加MEDIATYPE参数，并在使用该参数指示属性内容的媒体类型时替换类型参数。
